Package edu.ucsd.sbrg.util

Class GPRParser

java.lang.Object
edu.ucsd.sbrg.util.GPRParser
public class GPRParser extends Object
The GPRParser class provides methods to parse gene product associations (GPRs) from gene reaction rules and integrate them into SBML models using JSBML. It supports converting textual gene reaction rules into structured Association objects, handling logical operators, and merging associations into existing models. It also includes utilities for converting associations to the FBC v2 format and managing gene product references.

This class is designed to be used in scenarios where gene reaction rules need to be parsed from various formats and integrated into computational models in a structured and standardized form. It provides comprehensive support for handling complex logical structures in gene product associations, such as nested AND/OR conditions.

Utility methods in this class are static, allowing direct invocation without needing an instance of GPRParser. This class heavily relies on the JSBML library to manipulate elements of SBML files, particularly those related to the FBC (Flux Balance Constraints) package.

  • Constructor Details

    • GPRParser

      public GPRParser()

  • Method Details

    • parseGPR

      public static void parseGPR(org.sbml.jsbml.Reaction r, String geneReactionRule, boolean omitGenericTerms)
      Parses the gene product association (GPR) from a gene reaction rule string and associates it with a given reaction. This method first converts the gene reaction rule string into an Association object using a formula parser. If the conversion is successful and the Association object is not null, it further processes the association by parsing it into the reaction's gene product association.
      Parameters:
      r - The reaction to which the gene product association will be linked.
      geneReactionRule - The gene reaction rule string representing the association of gene products.
      omitGenericTerms - Flag indicating whether to omit generic terms (e.g., SBO terms) in the association.

    • convertToAssociation

      public static org.sbml.jsbml.ext.fbc.Association convertToAssociation(org.sbml.jsbml.ASTNode ast, String reactionId, org.sbml.jsbml.Model model, boolean omitGenericTerms)
      Converts an ASTNode representing a gene product association into an Association object. This method handles the logical structure of the gene product association, creating appropriate logical operators (AND, OR) based on the ASTNode type. It also manages the inclusion of SBO terms if they are not omitted.
      Parameters:
      ast - The ASTNode to be converted, representing the logical structure of the gene product association.
      reactionId - The ID of the reaction associated with this gene product association.
      model - The SBML model to which the reaction belongs, used to determine the level and version for new elements.
      omitGenericTerms - A boolean flag indicating whether to omit SBO terms in the resulting Association.
      Returns:
      An Association object representing the gene product association, which could be a LogicalOperator or a direct GeneProductRef.

    • createGPR

      public static org.sbml.jsbml.ext.fbc.GeneProductRef createGPR(String identifier, String reactionId, org.sbml.jsbml.Model model)
      Creates a GeneProductRef instance for a given identifier within a specific reaction context in the model. This method first checks if the identifier exists in the model, either with or without a "G_" prefix. If the identifier does not exist, it attempts to create a new GeneProduct in the model. If the identifier exists, it updates the existing GeneProduct's ID.
      Parameters:
      identifier - The identifier for the gene product, which may or may not start with "G_".
      reactionId - The ID of the reaction associated with this gene product.
      model - The SBML model containing the reaction and potentially the gene product.
      Returns:
      A GeneProductRef object linked to the gene product identified or created.

    • stringify

      public static String stringify(org.sbml.jsbml.ext.fbc.Association association)
      Converts an Association object into a human-readable string representation. This method handles different types of associations including GeneProductRef, And, and Or. For And and Or associations, it recursively calls itself to handle nested associations.
      Parameters:
      association - The Association object to be converted into a string.
      Returns:
      A string representation of the Association object.
